oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-08-30 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from August 30, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ray Price (host/performer), guest performer Charlie Walker, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 986th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ray Price; Rod Brasfield; Charlie Walker; Tommy Jackson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ray Price -- Invitation To The Blues (Ray Price) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Charlie Walker -- Pick Me Up On Your Way Down (Charlie Walker) -- Prince Albert commercial (Rod Brasfield, Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Tommy Jackson -- Stony Point (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Ray Price talks -- In The Garden (Ray Price)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Brasfield, Rod; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jackson, Tommy; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Walker, Charlie, 1926-2008
